name: Happy Farm Fruit Connect
description:
Happy Farm Fruit Connect - is one of the most entertaining and challenging match 3 puzzle games for your phone.

Packed with great graphics and new features such as color-matching Fruits and "Bombs" to make the classic game-play even better. This is an awesome matching casual game! Use your amazing skills to tap and combine the vegetables. Once you start playing, you will not be able to stop.
